mapper.select: select * from( select ROWNUM r , b.B_VEHICLENUM,b.r_num , m.m_name , g.g_name , s.s_name from bus b join member m on b.B_VEHICLENUM = m.B_VEHICLENUM join garage g on b.G_NUM = g.g_num join bstatus bs on b.b_vehiclenum = bs.b_vehiclenum join status s on bs.s_code = s.s_code) where r between 1 + (#{page} - 1) * 10 and 10 + (#{page} - 1) * 10

select count(*) from bus b join member m on b.B_VEHICLENUM = m.B_VEHICLENUM join garage g on b.G_NUM = g.g_num join bstatus bs on b.b_vehiclenum = bs.b_vehiclenum join status s on bs.s_code = s.s_code
